data.text:
Snapchat is a fast and fun way to share the moment with your friends and family

SNAP

â¢ Snapchat opens right to the Camera â just tap to take a photo, or press and hold for video.

â¢ Express yourself with Lenses, Filters, Bitmoji and more!

â¢ Try out new Lenses daily created by the Snapchat community!

CHAT

â¢ Stay in touch with friends through live messaging, or share your day with Group Stories.

â¢ Video Chat with up to 16 friends at once â you can even use Lenses and Filters when chatting!

â¢ Express yourself with Friendmojis â exclusive Bitmoji made just for you and a friend.

STORIES

â¢ Watch friends' Stories to see their day unfold.

â¢ See Stories from the Snapchat community that are based on your interests.

â¢ Discover breaking news and exclusive Original Shows.

SPOTLIGHT

â¢ Spotlight showcases the best of Snapchat!

â¢ Submit your own Snaps or sit back, relax, and watch.

â¢ Pick your favorites and share them with friends.

MAP

â¢ Share your location with your best friends or go off the grid with Ghost Mode.

â¢ See what your friends are up to on your most personal map when they share their location with you.

â¢ Explore live Stories from the community nearby or across the world!

MEMORIES

â¢ Save unlimited photos and videos of all your favorite moments.

â¢ Edit and send old moments to friends or save them to your Camera Roll.

â¢ Create Stories from your favorite Memories to share with friends and family.

FRIENDSHIP PROFILE

â¢ Every friendship has its own special profile to see the moments youâve saved together.

â¢ Discover new things you have in common with Charms â see how long youâve been friends, your astrological compatibility, your Bitmoji fashion sense, and more!

â¢ Friendship Profiles are just between you and a friend, so you can bond over what makes your friendship special.

Happy Snapping!

â¢ â¢ â¢

Please note: Snapchatters can always capture or save your messages by taking a screenshot, using a camera, or otherwise. Be mindful of what you Snap!

For a full description of our privacy practices, please see our Privacy Center.

waxelll ,

WARNING ! DO NOT TRUST SNAPCHAT.

I would just like to say that I used to love Snapchat. I had it since the year 2013 and had countless memories saved within the app. On August 17th 2022 , my Snapchat account was permanently locked for no reason . Literally from one day to another when I opened the app , I was logged out of my account. Immediately I thought someone had logged into my account and that was why I was logged out ( which is impossible considering the complexity of my password) but when I tried logging in, it said my account had been permanently locked and gave me no reason why. I feel very disappointed with the Snapchat corporation because if they had felt I violated their terms , I would at least like to know what it is I did wrong or violated instead of just closing my account without warning nor giving me a reason why . . Secondly If it was something I did , how did they acquire the knowledge? Was it Artificial intelligence scanning through our data? Or a human looking through our data and pictures? It makes me feel very uncomfortable to think how much of my privacy has been invaded ? Iâve emailed them numerous times already and have not gotten any emails back at all which is strange considering Snapchat is supposed to get back to its customers. If anyone can offer some help I would appreciate it
